Description:
[h2]Information[/h2]
Mod with Cheats, Tweaks and Quality of Life Improvements
[list]
[*]Bag of Tricks: Various QoL and other tweaks!
[*]Level Up: Make respec start from Level 0 for you and Companions
[*]Party Editor: Modify stats or features of party members
[*]Search 'n Pick: Search for ingame items/stuff and spawn/teleport/give yourself things!
[*]Etudes: Fix your progression by changing states!
[/list]

Warning: ToyBox for Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is new. Save early and often.
Note: Not all features are functional at this time. If you find non-functioning features please report.

[h2]Installation[/h2]
[list]
[*] Subscribe
[*] Use either:
[list]
[*]the official tool (Steam\steamapps\common\Warhammer 40,000 Rogue Trader\Modding\Steam Workshop tool\owlcat-modifications-manager-win32-x64) [b]Currently broken]
[*]Install [url=https://github.com/xADDBx/SteamWorkshopManager]this UnityModManager mod[/url] to let it manage Workshop mods for you. [url=https://streamable.com/22i86o]Here is a video showing how that works[/url]
[*]manually move the contents of the downloaded file into the UnityModManager Directory
[/list]
[/list]

[url=https://www.reddit.com/r/RogueTraderCRPG/comments/18cxbyo/modding_in_rogue_trader/]Information on Modding in Rogue Trader[/url]
[url=https://github.com/xADDBx/ToyBox/blob/RT/ToyBox/ReadMe.md]Release Notes[/url]
Author: Narria
